summary: This is a preservation letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Apple, Inc., directing the company to preserve content and information associated with specified accounts for 90 days as part of an ongoing investigation. The letter requests non-disclosure to the account subscribers.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the preservation letter as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, directing Apple to preserve account information.

events.title: Preservation Letter Issued to Apple
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office issued a formal preservation letter to Apple, Inc., directing the company to preserve all content and information associated with specified accounts for 90 days as part of an ongoing investigation.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York issued a preservation letter to Apple, Inc. on December 12, 2018.
The letter directs Apple to preserve all content and information associated with specified accounts for 90 days under 18 U.S.C. ยง 2703(f)(1).
The letter requests that Apple not disclose the existence of the letter to the account subscribers or others, indicating a sensitive, ongoing investigation.
The accounts subject to preservation are not listed in the provided text, suggesting they may be redacted or in a separate attachment.
